definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: The mobile phone has already enabled developing countries to skip fixed-line networks.
sentences.chinese: 移動電話已經使發展中國家跨越了固話網絡這個階段。

sentences.english: P.S. The irony is that I hate mobile phones.
sentences.chinese: 諷刺的是我痛恨移動電話。

sentences.english: For example, satellite phones are illegal in some countries.
sentences.chinese: 例如，衛星移動電話在一些國家是違法的。

sentences.english: Some people thellonk that mobile phones are useful and convenient.
sentences.chinese: 有些人以爲移動電話很有用和利便。

sentences.english: Boke space not only in computers, a substantial presence in the mobile phone.
sentences.chinese: 博客空間不只在電腦上，還大量存在於移動電話上。

sentences.english: Do the security guards carry beepers or mobile phones?
sentences.chinese: 工廠保安員是否有對講機或是移動電話？

sentences.english: Siku relied on his much smaller video camera — the one in his mobile phone — to get the images.
sentences.chinese: 西庫利用移動電話上的小型攝影機攝取圖像。

sentences.english: Indeed, Japan is good example of how such subcultures come about.
sentences.chinese: 有關移動電話亞文化的產生，日本確實是一個好例子。

sentences.english: Mobile phone's rate of increment has surpassed fixed-line telephone's development speed.
sentences.chinese: 移動電話的增長率已超過了固定電話的發展速度。

sentences.english: That will be a completely new way of doing business for cellular providers.
sentences.chinese: 對移動電話運營商而言，這將是一種全新的生意途徑。

sentences.english: When it comes to cell-phone software, open is the new black.
sentences.chinese: 說起移動電話軟件，開放是個新的不確定性。

sentences.english: MobileReciter is a Quran Reciter for mobile phones.
sentences.chinese: 移動朗誦者是一個移動電話古蘭經吟誦。

sentences.english: Nearly all airtime in Africa is pre-paid.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲，移動電話通話費用都是預付的。

sentences.english: Your choice of KKK mobile phone is welcome.
For example we can use cell phones for disseminating information to remote areas.
sentences.chinese: 例如我們可以使用移動電話把信息傳播到遙遠的地區。

sentences.english: Please call back from a mobile phone to hail a taxi.
sentences.chinese: 請用移動電話進行訂車呼叫。

definition: to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
variant of 訂單|订单[ding4 dan1]
bill of warrant (certificate, allowing one to collect money or valuables)
(computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)

pinyin: guo2 min2 sheng1 chan3 zong3 zhi2
